advancements.rewindwatch.recall.descript: Recall yourself to a previous location using a Rewind Watch
advancements.rewindwatch.recall.title: That Felt Strange
advancements.rewindwatch.recall_far_away: Use a Rewind Watch to recall yourself from 11:59
item.rewindwatch.rewind_watch.hidden: The watch is impossible to make out
rewindwatch.configuration.post_effects.t:
• §bON§r — Show all post effects
• §bSIMPLE§r — Show post effects as simpler versions that don't move
• §bOFF§r — Don't show any post effects
rewindwatch.dimension_gone: The dimension you are recalling to no longer exists
